price: 31. Farao zei: “Breng het dan, als je waarachtig bent!”
arabic: قَالَ فَأۡتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla fati bihi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
